comments.text: layout/tools/reftest/README.txt needs to be updated to cover the new features added in bug 624636. In the comments there, it was decided to update that file instead of migrating the documentation to devmo, so I'm filing this bug for someone to handle that, so I can clear the doc needed flag on that bug and get it off my radar. :)
